title: Bug 13620 - Java Source Attachment Preference Page Displays Excessive White Space
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page contains a label positioned in the middle of the page, surrounded by a significant amount of white space. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
EB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page is expected to display the label with an appropriate vertical alignment, specifically set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
SR:
1. Load a project from the repository.
2. Select a source folder.
3. Open Properties.
4. Select 'Java Source Attachment.'
5. Observe the appearance of an info label in the middle of the dialog.
